climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: ✔️ Gentle and skin-friendly formula for Sensitive Skin: Our laundry detergent sheets are free of irritants and harsh chemicals. Our all-natural laundry detergent strips are ideal for the entire family.
✔️ Hypoallergenic: Have skin that reacts to harsh detergents? Our spring laundry detergent strips consist of gentle laundry soap that leaves your laundry clean and fresh every time.

✔️ 100% Biodegradable, Eco Friendly formula: Our company strives for sustainable practices. Our Laundry Detergent is Septic Tank Friendly and our Zero-Waste Policy means that our laundry detergent strips / sheets are made up with recyclable packaging and ethically sourced materials.

✔️ 100% Plastic-free: Our sustainable environmental policies include a strict “NO Plastic” rule. Our all-natural laundry detergent strips are made and packaged completely without the use of plastics. Each strip of our laundry detergent is packaged in a way that keeps it safe and concentrated for a long time.

✔️ Ultra-Light Weight Detergent: Eco Living laundry detergent strips contain a highly concentrated dose of laundry soap and are compact and ultra-lightweight convenient for travel. For a full load of laundry, all you need is one single strip of our detergent, and with 40 strips of detergent per pack, our lightweight detergent strips are a great buy even when traveling.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Eco Laundry Detergent Strips Zero waste and budget-friendly! Our detergent strip package is cardboard, not plastic. Our strips will make your laundry zero waste and lower your cost per load at the same time. Our detergent is easy to use, mess-free, and perfectly portioned. We removed the water from our detergent, resulting in an ultra concentred detergent strip. Did you know that a traditional liquid detergent is 60-90% water? Worried about the ingredients? Don't be! Our strips are free of harmful chemicals and will keep your home safe and clean. The unscented version is perfect for people with sensitive skin. How do I use laundry strips? Easy! Tear off a sheet using the perforated line to make one strip. Toss it right into your washing machine with your clothes.

Zero Waste Laundry Detergent OK for high efficiency & standard machinesOK for hand wash & hot/cold waterOK for coloured & whitesFree of 1.4 dioxane & phosphates, dyes & bleachNo animal testing or animal by-products

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saves on space and waste
reviews.reviewText: I love these little sheets. I have a travel size washer and only need 1/2 sheet per load of laundry. These are economical, space saving, wash clothes well and don’t irritate my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean laundry without plastic container
reviews.reviewText: This product cleans my laundry, there is no plastic waste, and it's much easier to store than large plastic containers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets clothes clean
reviews.reviewText: My clothes came out clean. I appreciate the eco packaging, ease of use, and no big detergent bottle. Nice scent, although I wish it was a little stronger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact that it’s so light and easy to carry. Where I live at I will have a laundry facility on site so I love that I don’t have to carry a big bottle and it’s great for the environment. I have very sensitive skin that is sensitive even to other sensitive skin laundry detergents but I have not had any issues with this product. I love that it has no smell and it gets my clothes really clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NEW FAVORITE THING
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: these really are a well executed and cool idea, but i don’t use them anymore. I gave Charlie’s laundry soap and never turned back- powder detergents are where it’s at for people that:1) have their own washing machine2) have a space to keep detergentBut if you have a communal laundry situation, are a college student, or want to be on the safe side while traveling - THESE.I do big loads so I used an entire sheet, torn into quarters and thrown on the bottom of the washer. When I opened the dryer I was delighted to find that my clothes smelled like clean clothes! And my clothes are genuinely disgusting when they go into the washer, from sweat, blood, animal hair and poop, engine oil, grease, and who knows what else - so this was no small task I was asking of these sheets. theyre so much easier than pods. I’m trying to get my mom to switch now! plus anyone else that will listen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not only does this work for my home He washing machine, but when I travel to take a couple of sheets and be able to do my own laundry is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These laundry sheets are the best I have tried. They’re not sticky to the touch like other brands and they have the most pleasant clean smell. I highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not that strong
reviews.reviewText: I felt like I had to use a fell sheet to wash a load instead of the recommended 1/2 a sheet for a load to get my clothes clean

reviews.reviewTitle: Gets the dirtiest of clothes clean
reviews.reviewText: This was my first experience with laundry detergent sheets. We have laundry in a very small closet in our bedroom and only a few inches of space to store detergent etc. so I had to find an alternative to regular detergent. I also hate how wasteful regular detergent containers are.A few pros:- I have very sensitive skin and haven't had any issues- I do not notice any scent with the unscented (very important to me)- My husband works in construction and his clothes are FILTHY! His clothes come out spotless with these sheets.I have a compact washing machine, that fits more than many other compact washers. I fill it as full as I can (equivalent to a medium load in a full size washer) and use 1/2 a sheet (1 load size) works great. I have also used this with hot, warm and cold washes without an issue.Highly recommend
Natural, odor less, my clothes are clean and it ships in 2 days when I run out ! I've been using it for a year and I love it !

The media could not be loaded. These work well. I like that they use clean ingredients, it doesn’t take up much space and it’s better for the environment. Definitely worth swapping over from liquid laundry soap.

Used these for the first time during a 3 month trip to Europe. We stayed in over a dozen different accomodations, fortunately many had a washing machine. This product performs like a champ! Being very allergic to fragrances, and because most of the public laundromats' washing machines add their own highly scented detergent (unlike the ones in Asia) - these strips really saved me. Convenient to pack (very flat), the cardboard package takes up almost no space. Cleans clothes well enough. Unscented. Will be buying more for my next trip. Highly recommend.

This seems like an excellent product. I used several sheets now and they dissolve quickly into suds. My clothes are coming out of the washer very clean. I will need to use for a longer time to be more precise.
